tagline: A plugin for enabling collapsible lists with cookie support
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Jquery-collapse
body:
=============== jQuery Collapse =============== A lightweight plugin for enabling expandable/collapsible content. - Packaged with cookie support (yum yum!) - Lightweight (655 bytes minified and gzipped) - ARIA compliant Enjoy! Usage ----- HTML::

Fruits

  • Apple
  • Pear
  • Orange

Info

You can use any container you like (in this case a div)

JavaScript:: *Note*: If you're using the plugin on different pages on the same domain, you'll have to have a unique cookie name for each instance to avoid conflict. Use the "cookie" option to set a unique cookie name. Options ------- * **show** (function) : Custom function for showing content (default: function(){ this.show() }) * **hide** (function) : Custom function for hiding content (default: function(){ this.hide() }) * **head** (string) : Elements for clickable headings (default: "h3") * **group** (string): Elements containing the collapsable content (default: "ul, div") * **cookieName** (string) : Name of cookie used in the plugin. (default: "collapse") Browser Support --------------- Probably works in most modern browsers, but only tested in: Safari, Chrome, IE6+, Firefox3+, Opera10+ *Google Chrome* does not work with cookies if run locally (i.e file://) For more details: http://code.google.com/p/chromium/issues/detail?id=535
